Microlensing LSST Light curve Simulator

Welcome to ulens_lsst Documentation

The ulens_lsst package simulates microlensing events for the LSST, supporting DP0 simulations, DP1 real data, and rubin_sim light curves. It is designed for flexible experimentation, publication, and installation via pip.
